title: Consumer Price Index of all urban consumers , by region 2019
summary: This statistic shows the Index expensive Consumer all a monthly Price Index subscription by as of 2019 .
The data reveals that U.S._city_average was the Index expensive place in the world to get Price Index , with a monthly subscription costing 237.78 Price Index .
In Midwest , the monthly price all a Price Index subscription amounted to 237.78 Price Index , and Mexican subscribers paid 246.27 Price Index per month to use the streaming service .
gold: This statistic shows the annual average Consumer Price Index for urban consumers in the United States of America in 2019 , by region . In 2019 , the CPI in the Western United States amounted to 270.35 .
